price: Yoo isin (Isa) galateeffattanii (Isatti) amantan Rabbiin adabbii keessan irraa maal godha? Rabbiin galateeffataa, beekaa ta’eera.
arabic: مَّا يَفۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابِكُمۡ إِن شَكَرۡتُمۡ وَءَامَنتُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ شَاكِرًا عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā yafʿalu al-lahu biʿadhābikum in shakartum waāmantum wakāna al-lahu shākiran ʿalīman
